Bash("C:\\Users\\alan9\\OneDrive\\Desktop\\MoodNotes-Pro\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -X utf8 -c "
import requests, json, sys
sys.stdout.reconfigure\(encoding=''utf-8''\)

base = ''http://localhost:8001/api''
r = requests.post\(f''{base}/auth/login/'', json={''username'':''testuser'',''password'':''Test1234!''}\)
token = r.json\(\)[''access'']
headers = {''Authorization'': f''Bearer {token}''}

# Test 1: Positive note
r1 = requests.post\(f''{base}/notes/'', json={
    ''content'': ''今天超級開心！和朋友去爬山，天氣好棒，感覺充滿能量和活力，真的很幸福！'',
    ''metadata'': {''weather'': ''晴天'', ''temperature'': 26, ''tags'': [''戶外'', ''朋友'', ''運動'']}
}, headers=headers\)
print\(''=== 正面日誌 ===''\)
d1 = r1.json\(\)
print\(f''情緒分數: {d1[""sentiment_score""]}''\)
print\(f''壓力指數: {d1[""stress_index""]}''\)
print\(f''AI 回饋:\\n{d1[""ai_feedback""]}''\)

print\(\)

# Test 2: Negative note
r2 = requests.post\(f''{base}/notes/'', json={
    ''content'': ''今天壓力好大，工作趕不完，焦慮到失眠，覺得好累好煩，真的崩潰了。'',
    ''metadata'': {''weather'': ''陰天'', ''temperature'': 18, ''tags'': [''工作'', ''壓力'']}
}, headers=headers\)
print\(''=== 負面日誌 ===''\)
d2 = r2.json\(\)
print\(f''情緒分數: {d2[""sentiment_score""]}''\)
print\(f''壓力指數: {d2[""stress_index""]}''\)
print\(f''AI 回饋:\\n{d2[""ai_feedback""]}''\)
")
